metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Remote user interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AC02 Public Network Access To Cloud Application
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Apply TLS-based encryption and certificate for connection (cloud application)
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Remote user connects to the cloud application though a public network (e.g. Wi-Fi) and can be attacked by a third-party adversary (affects remote user)
